content: insert hook into the back bar of the first chain slip_stitch through all back loop of first and loops on the hook last sts of round and weave in ends back-stitch fold the work toward you identify the back of the video at a yarn of serendipity designated stitch long single_crochet insert your hook between the inverted v and complete insert hook in st and pull up a loop pull loop up almost the stitch to the length of the previous st hps yo and pull through 2 loops on hook single_crochet into designated stitch chain 1 fpsc yo insert hook around the same single_crochet pull up a loop to the insert hook from front-to-back-to-front around post so height of the stitch 3 times post is in front of hook yo and pull up a loop yo and pull through all 7 loops yo and pull through remaining 2 loops on hook video at a yarn of serendipity shell 5 treble_crochet picot 5 treble_crochet in designated st symbol guide asterisks * to repeat instructions after a single asterisk as directed example *single_crochet in chain-1 space chain 1 skip next half_double_crochet single_crochet in next chain-1 space chain 1 skip next fpdc repeat from * around parentheses indicates a group of sts that are worked together in or around the same st i also use parentheses to indicate the name of sts skipped example #1 2 double_crochet chain 2 2 double_crochet in chain-2 space example #2 skip next 2 half_double_crochet chain-1 space 2 half_double_crochet brackets repeat instructions within brackets as directed example double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in next double_crochet chain 1 skip treble_crochet 2 times count totals total chain spaces are included in the st count corner chain spaces are not included in the total example counts 48 double_crochet 36 fptr 8 chain-2 space 4 chain-2 corner space 100 total/25 per side kinnedy nichelle square a yarn of serendipity copyright © 2023 page 2 of 23 special instructions instructions for all rounds start with a standing stitch and end with an invisible join to 2nd st of round and fasten_off if not changing colors you can opt to finish the previous round with a slip_stitch join and use the appropriate chain or chainless starting stitch to begin the next round keep in mind that if you choose the slip stitch end the chain or chainless starting stitch will replace the first standing st of the round ✔️ navigate between written instructions stitch definitions videos and pictures by clicking on the corresponding links for example you can click here to see a picture of the square and then click on the picture to return to the link to view the yarns and colors used click here then click on the yarns and colors used link to return please be aware that some mobile phone users may experience difficulties round 1 colorway 1 a buttercup colorway 2 a pewter in a double magic_ring chain 3 counts as 1st double_crochet of round 7 double_crochet into
